title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Personalized Instructional Design to Strengthen Mathematics Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Core Middle School Mathematics Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more personal/professional factors that motivate their mathematics learning
Learners can implement two or more motivation-enhancing strategies tailored to their needs based on individualized lesson design
Learners can explain how to recognize changes in motivation during mathematical problem-solving and incorporate them into learning plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
